data.Name: Bo-Katan Kryze
data.Subtitle: Princess in Exile
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}]: If you attacked with a Mandalorian unit this phase, deal 1 damage to a unit.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: On Attack: You may deal 1 damage to a unit. If you attacked with another Mandalorian unit this phase, you may deal 1 damage to a unit. (The same unit or a different unit.)

data.Name: Boba Fett
data.Subtitle: Collecting the Bounty
data.FrontText: When an enemy unit leaves play: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, ready a resource.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: When this unit completes an attack: If an enemy unit left play this phase, ready up to 2 resources.

data.Name: Boba Fett
data.Subtitle: Daimyo
data.FrontText: When you play a unit that has 1 or more KEYWORDS: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, give a friendly unit +1/+0 for this phase.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: Each other friendly unit that has 1 or more KEYWORDS gets +1/+0.

data.Name: Bossk
data.Subtitle: Hunting His Prey
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}]: Deal 1 damage to a unit with a BOUNTY. You may give it +1/+0 for this phase.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: When you collect a BOUNTY: You may collect that BOUNTY again. Use this ability only once each round.

data.Name: Cad Bane
data.Subtitle: He Who Needs No Introduction
data.FrontText: When you play an Underworld card: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, an opponent chooses a unit they control. Deal 1 damage to it.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
RAID 2 (This unit gets +2/+0 while attacking.)
When you play an Underworld card: You may choose an opponent. They choose a unit they control. Deal 2 damage to it. Use this ability only once each round.

data.Name: Cassian Andor
data.Subtitle: Dedicated to the Rebellion
data.FrontText: Action [1, {Exhaust}]: If you've dealt 3 or more damage to an enemy base this phase, draw a card.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
SABOTEUR (When this unit attacks, ignore Sentinel and defeat the defender's Shields.)
When you deal damage to an enemy base: You may draw a card. Use this ability only once each round.

data.Name: Chewbacca
data.Subtitle: Walking Carpet
data.FrontText: Action [{Exhaust}]: Play a unit that costs 3 or less from your hand (paying its cost). It gains Sentinel for this phase.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 7 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
SENTINEL (Units in this arena can't attack your non-Sentinel units or your base.)
GRIT (This unit gets +1/+0 for each damage on it.)

data.Name: Chirrut Îmwe
data.Subtitle: One With the Force
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}]: Give a unit +0/+2 for this phase.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: During the action phase, this unit isn't defeated by having no remaining HP. (During the regroup phase, if he has no remaining HP, defeat him.)

data.Name: Count Dooku
data.Subtitle: Face of the Confederacy
data.FrontText: Action [Exhaust]: Play a Separatist card from your hand. It gains Exploit 1. (You may defeat 1 unit you control. If you do, that card costs 2 less.)
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 7 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
Overwhelm (When attacking an enemy unit, deal excess damage to the opponent's base.)
On Attack: The next Separatist card you play this phase gains Exploit 3.

data.Name: Darth Vader
data.Subtitle: Dark Lord of the Sith
data.FrontText: Action [{C=1}, {Exhaust}]: If you played a Villainy card this phase, deal 1 damage to a unit and 1 damage to a base.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 7 or more resources, deploy this leader. (Flip him, ready him, and move him to the ground arena.)
data.BackText: On Attack: You may deal 2 damage to a unit.

data.Name: Director Krennic
data.Subtitle: Aspiring to Authority
data.FrontText: Each friendly damaged unit gets +1/+0.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: Restore 2 (When this unit attacks, heal 2 damage from your base.) Each friendly damaged unit gets +1/+0.

data.Name: Doctor Aphra
data.Subtitle: Rapacious Archaeologist
data.FrontText: When the regroup phase starts: Discard a card from your deck.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
While there are 5 or more different costs among cards in your discard pile, this unit gets +3/+0.
When Deployed: Choose 3 cards in your discard pile with different names. If you do, return 1 of them at random to your hand.

data.Name: Emperor Palpatine
data.Subtitle: Galactic Ruler
data.FrontText: Action [{C=1}, {Exhaust}, defeat a friendly unit]: Deal 1 damage to a unit and draw a card.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 8 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
When Deployed: Take control of a damaged non-leader unit.
On Attack: You may defeat another friendly unit. If you do, deal 1 damage to a unit and draw a card.

data.Name: Fennec Shand
data.Subtitle: Honoring the Deal
data.FrontText: Action [{C=1}, {{Exhaust}}]: Play a unit that costs 4 or less from your hand (paying its cost). Give it AMBUSH for this phase. (After you play the unit, it may ready and attack an enemy unit.)
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
SABOTEUR (When this unit attacks, ignore Sentinel and defeat the defender's Shields.)
Action: Play a unit that costs 4 or less from your hand (paying its cost.) Give it AMBUSH for this phase.

data.Name: Finn
data.Subtitle: This is a Rescue
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}]: Defeat a friendly upgrade on a unit. If you do, give a Shield token to that unit.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: On Attack: You may defeat a friendly upgrade on a unit. If you do, give a Shield token to that unit.

data.Name: Gar Saxon
data.Subtitle: Viceroy of Mandalore
data.FrontText: Each friendly upgraded unit gets +1/+0.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: Each friendly upgraded unit gets +1/+0 and gains "When Defeated: You may return an upgrade that was attached to this unit to its owner's hand."

data.Name: Grand Admiral Thrawn
data.Subtitle: Patient and Insightful
data.FrontText:
When the action phase starts: Look at the top card of each player's deck.
Action [{C=1}, {Exhaust}]: Reveal the top card of any player's deck. Exhaust a unit that costs the same as or less than the revealed card.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 7 or more resources, deploy this leader. (Flip him, ready him, and move him to the ground arena.)
data.BackText:
When the action phase starts: Look at the top card of each player's deck.
On Attack: You may reveal the top card of any player's deck. Exhaust a unit that costs the same as or less than the revealed card.

data.Name: Grand Inquisitor
data.Subtitle: Hunting The Jedi
data.FrontText: Action [{Exhaust}]: Deal 2 damage to a friendly unit with 3 or less power and ready it.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: On Attack: You may deal 1 damage to another friendly unit with 3 or less power and ready it.

data.Name: Grand Moff Tarkin
data.Subtitle: Oversector Governor
data.FrontText: Action [{C=1}, {{Exhaust}}]: Give an Experience token to an IMPERIAL unit.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: On Attack: You may give an Experience token to another IMPERIAL unit.

data.Name: Han Solo
data.Subtitle: Audacious Smuggler
data.FrontText: Action [{Exhaust}]: Put a card from your hand into play as a resource and ready it. At the start of the next action phase, defeat a resource you control.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: On Attack: Put the top card of your deck into play as a resource and ready it. At the start of the next action phase, defeat a resource you control.

data.Name: Han Solo
data.Subtitle: Worth the Risk
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}]: Play a unit from your hand. It costs 1 less. Deal 2 damage to it.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: Action: Play a unit from your hand. It costs 1 less. Deal 2 damage to it.

data.Name: Hera Syndulla
data.Subtitle: Spectre Two
data.FrontText: Ignore the aspect penalty on SPECTRE cards you play.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
Ignore the aspect penalty on SPECTRE cards you play.
On Attack: You may give an Experience token to another unique unit.

data.Name: Hondo Ohnaka
data.Subtitle: That's Good Business
data.FrontText: When you play a card using SMUGGLE: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, give an Experience token to a unit.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
RAID 1 (This unit gets +1/+0 while attacking.)
When you play a card using SMUGGLE: You may give an Experience token to a unit.

data.Name: Hunter
data.Subtitle: Outcast Sergeant
data.FrontText: Action [{{C=1}}, {{Exhaust}}]: Reveal a resource you control. If it shares a name with a friendly unique unit, return the resource to its owner's hand and put the top card of your deck into play as a resource.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 7 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
OVERWHELM
On Attack: You may reveal a resource you control. If it shares a name with a friendly unique unit, return the resource to its owner's hand and put the top card of your deck into play as a resource.

data.Name: IG-88
data.Subtitle: Ruthless Bounty Hunter
data.FrontText: Action [{Exhaust}]: Attack with a unit. If you control more units than the defending player, the attacker gets +1/+0 for this attack.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: Each other friendly unit gains Raid 1. (They get +1/+0 while attacking.)

data.Name: Iden Versio
data.Subtitle: Infero Squad Commander
data.FrontText: Action [{Exhaust}]: If an enemy unit was defeated this phase, heal 1 damage from your base.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
SHIELDED (When you deploy this leader, give her a Shield token.)
When an enemy unit is defeated: Heal 1 damage from your base.

data.Name: Jabba the Hutt
data.Subtitle: His High Exaltdeness
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}]: Choose a unit. For this phase it gains: "BOUNTY - The next unit you play this phase costs 1 less."
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 7 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
When Deployed: Another friendly unit captures an enemy non-leader unit.
Action [{{Exhaust}}]: Choose a unit. For this phase, it gains "BOUNTY - The next unit you play this phase costs 2 less."

data.Name: Jango Fett
data.Subtitle: Concealing the Conspiracy
data.FrontText: When a friendly unit deals damage to an enemy unit: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, exhaust that enemy unit.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: When a friendly unit deals damage to an enemy unit: You may exhaust that unit.

data.Name: Jyn Erso
data.Subtitle: Resisting Oppression
data.FrontText: Action [{Exhaust}]: Attack with a unit. The defender gets -1/-0 for this attack.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: While a friendly unit is attacking, the defender gets -1/-0.

data.Name: Kylo Ren
data.Subtitle: Rash and Deadly
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}, discard a card from your hand]: Give a unit +2/+0 for this phase.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 4 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: This unit gets -1/-0 for each card in your hand.

data.Name: Lando Calrissian
data.Subtitle: With Impeccable Taste
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}]: Play a card using SMUGGLE. It costs 2 less. Defeat a resource you own and control.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 4 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: Action: Play a card using SMUGGLE. It costs 2 less. Defeat a resource you own and control. Use this ability only once each round.

data.Name: Leia Organa
data.Subtitle: Alliance General
data.FrontText: Action [{Exhaust}]: Attack with a REBEL unit. Then, you may attack with another REBEL unit.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
Raid 1 (This unit gets +1/+0 while attacking.)
When this unit completes an attack: You may attack with another REBEL unit.

data.Name: Luke Skywalker
data.Subtitle: Faithful Friend
data.FrontText: Action [{C=1}, {Exhaust}]: Give a Shield token to a Heroism unit you played this phase.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader. (Flip him, ready him, and move him to the ground arena.)
data.BackText: On Attack: You may give another unit a Shield token.

data.Name: Mace Windu
data.Subtitle: Vaapad Form Master
data.FrontText: Action [C=1, Exhaust]: Deal 1 damage to a damaged enemy unit. Then, if it has 5 or more damage on it, deal 1 damage to it.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 7 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: When Deployed: Deal 2 damage to each damaged enemy unit.

data.Name: Moff Gideon
data.Subtitle: Formidable Commander
data.FrontText: Action [{{Exhaust}}]: Attack with a unit that costs 3 or less. If it's attacking a unit, it gets +1/+0 for this attack.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader. (Flip him, ready him, and move him to the ground arena.)
data.BackText:
OVERWHELM (When attacking an enemy unit, deal excess damage to the opponent's base.)
Each friendly unit that costs 3 or less gets +1/+0 and gains OVERWHELM while attacking an enemy unit.

data.Name: Nute Gunray
data.Subtitle: Vindictive Viceroy
data.FrontText: Action [Exhaust]: If 2 or more friendly units were defeated this phase, create a Battle Droid token.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: On Attack: Create a Battle Droid token.

data.Name: Qi'ra
data.Subtitle: I Alone Survived
data.FrontText: Action [{{C=1}}, {{Exhaust}}]: Deal 2 damage to a friendly unit. Then, give a Shield token to it.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
GRIT (This unit gets +1/+0 for each damage on her.)
When Deployed: Heal all damage from each unit. Then, deal damage to each unit equal to half its remaining HP, rounded down.

data.Name: Quinlan Vos
data.Subtitle: Sticking the Landing
data.FrontText: When you play a unit: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, deal 1 damage to an enemy unit that costs the same as the played unit.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 5 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: When you play a unit: You may deal 1 damage to an enemy unit that costs the same as or less than the played unit.

data.Name: Rey
data.Subtitle: More Than a Scavenger
data.FrontText: Action [{{C=1}}, {{Exhaust}}]: Give an Experience token to a unit with 2 or less power.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText:
RESTORE 3 (When this unit attacks, heal 3 damage from your base.)
On Attack: You may give an Experience token to a unit with 2 or less power.

data.Name: Sabine Wren
data.Subtitle: Galvanized Revolutionary
data.FrontText: Action [{Exhaust}]: Deal 1 damage to each base.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 4 or more resources, deploy this leader.
data.BackText: On Attack: Deal 1 damage to each enemy base.

data.Name: The Mandalorian
data.Subtitle: Sworn to the Creed
data.FrontText: When you play an upgrade: You may exhaust this leader. If you do, exhaust an enemy unit with 4 or less remaining HP.
data.EpicAction: Epic Action: If you control 6 or more resources, deploy this leader. (Flip him, ready him, and move him to the ground arena.)
data.BackText: When you play an upgrade: You may exhaust an enemy unit with 6 or less remaining HP.
